summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Scholarship Feature (Iteration 10). All 10 backend tests passed. Frontend UI testing verified scholarship column displays correctly in all tables and edit dialogs allow full admission editing.
passed_tests: Backend: POST /api/admissions with scholarship_amount - creates admission with scholarship (201 OK)
Backend: POST /api/admissions without scholarship_amount - creates admission with null scholarship (201 OK)
Backend: PUT /api/admissions/{id} - adds scholarship to existing admission (200 OK)
Backend: PUT /api/admissions/{id} - modifies existing scholarship amount (200 OK)
Backend: Admin can edit all admission fields (name, place, date, fees, scholarship) (200 OK)
Backend: Counselor can edit own admission including scholarship (200 OK)
Backend: GET /api/admissions returns scholarship_amount in list (200 OK)
Backend: GET /api/admin/stats/admissions-list returns admissions with scholarship (200 OK)
Frontend: Admissions page - Scholarship column visible in table with purple badges
Frontend: Admissions page - Add Admission dialog has Scholarship Amount field
Frontend: Admissions page - Edit Admission dialog has Scholarship Amount field with current value
Frontend: Performance Dashboard - All Admissions tab shows Scholarship column
Frontend: Performance Dashboard - Edit dialog allows editing all fields including scholarship
Frontend: Counselor Performance page (/performance) - Admissions tab shows Scholarship column
Frontend: Counselor Performance page - Edit dialog allows editing all fields including scholarship
seed_data_creation: Test admissions created with TEST_ prefix and cleaned up after tests. Existing seed data includes 2 admissions with scholarship amounts (Jane Merit: ₹75,000, John Scholar: ₹10,000).
context_for_next_testing_agent: Scholarship feature fully tested and working. Key points: 1) scholarship_amount field added to AdmissionBase, AdmissionCreate, AdmissionUpdate models in backend. 2) Create and update endpoints save/return scholarship_amount correctly. 3) Frontend pages (Admissions at /admissions, Performance Dashboard at /admin/performance, Counselor Performance at /performance) all display scholarship column in tables with purple badges. 4) All edit dialogs allow editing complete admission details including scholarship. 5) Admin, Team Lead, and Admission Manager can edit any admission. Regular counselors can edit their own admissions.

details: Admissions page (/admissions) - Scholarship column in table
Admissions page - Add Admission dialog has Scholarship Amount input
Admissions page - Edit Admission dialog has Scholarship Amount input
Performance Dashboard (/admin/performance) - Scholarship column in All Admissions tab
Performance Dashboard - Edit dialog has Scholarship Amount input
Counselor Performance (/performance) - Scholarship column in Admissions tab
Counselor Performance - Edit dialog has Scholarship Amount input
Scholarship displayed as purple badge with Gift icon
Admin can edit all admission fields
Team Lead can edit team members' admissions
Admission Manager can edit all admissions
Edit dialogs show all fields: name, place, college, course, date, fees, scholarship, instalments, remarks
